articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Russia making efforts to avert food crisis, Putin tells African nations - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Russian president offers free grain to six African countries days after withdrawing from Ukraine grain export deal.
articles.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin has offered free grain to six African countries, telling African leaders at a conference in St Petersburg that Moscow is making efforts to avert a global food crisis … [+5660 chars]

articles.author: Robyn Dixon
articles.title: African leaders urge Putin to end blockade of Ukraine's grain - The Washington Post
articles.description: Putin's move has heightened fears that the blockade will lead to a spike in food prices, worsening a global food security emergency in the Horn of Africa.
